channel.title: Audio Falling Out of Sync
channel.description:
Well, I'm making some videos of me playing a game... (A Zelda game o.O) And I've managed to sync up the audio so it's perfect, but when uploading to YouTube, changing to WMV, etc... The audio falls behind. I synced it up by changing the frame rate from 20 FPS to 20.07 FPS, but yea... It... falls behind...
Anyways, I've been Googling and looking for an answer, but haven't found anything. Suggestions?
~Lin

item.title: Audio Falling Out of Sync
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I wanted it on YouTube… Anyways, I re-recorded it uses HyperCam and it was off-sync until I used the same program I used before to re-sync it, and it turned out fine (Except half way through, it’s maybe 100-300 MS off. Nothing big, and I can easily fix it in my later videos). Free to lock this topic now.

Read full topic

item.title: Audio Falling Out of Sync
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

What about puting it on a download link and sending to who ever you want to see.

Or you can use tinypic or what ever it is
